item.hint: h ld This is a way السلام عليكمto tell someone to take a seat.
item.feedback: f ld اِنبَطِح means "Lie down." The root of the verb is بطح

item.hint: h st This is a way السلام عليكمto order someone to maintain an upright position on his feet.
item.feedback: f st Встаньтe السلام عليكمmeans stand. It is the formal command form of the verb встать.

item.hint: h wa This is a السلام عليكمway to tell someone to not go further.
item.feedback: f wa Ждите, السلام عليكمformal command form of ждать, means wait.

item.hint: h ch This is a way السلام عليكمto tell someone to move in your direction.
item.feedback: f ch Подойдите السلام عليكمmeans come here. It is formal command form of the verb подойти.

item.hint: h gof This is a way السلام عليكمto tell someone to move away from you.
item.feedback: f gof Идите, formal السلام عليكمcommand form of the verb идти, means go on foot.

item.hint: h sto This is a way to السلام عليكمtell someone not to move.
item.feedback: f sto Oстановитесь السلام عليكمmeans stop. It is the formal command form of the verb oстановиться.

item.hint: h ta This is what you السلام عليكمtell someone when you are offering something.
item.feedback: f ta Возьмите, formal السلام عليكمcommand form of взять, means take.

item.hint: h gi This is a way to order السلام عليكمsomeone to yield possession of something.
item.feedback: f gi Дайте, formal السلام عليكمcommand form of дать, means give.

item.hint: h pd This is a way to السلام عليكمtell someone to place a thing somewhere.
item.feedback: f pd Положите, formal السلام عليكمcommand form of положить, means put down.

item.hint: h pu This is a way to tell السلام عليكمsomeone to take something by hand.
item.feedback: f pu Поднимите, formal السلام عليكمcommand form of поднимать, means pick up.

item.hint: h sp This is a way to tell السلام عليكمsomeone to pronounce words.
item.feedback: f sp Говорите, formal السلام عليكمof говорить, means speak.

item.hint: h li This is a way to ask السلام عليكمsomeone to pay attention to what you are saying.
item.feedback: f li Слушайте, formal السلام عليكمcommand form of слушать, means listen.

item.hint: h op This is a way to tell السلام عليكمsomeone to create an opening.
item.feedback: f op Откройте, formal السلام عليكمcommand form of the verb открыть, means open.

item.hint: h cl This is the opposite السلام عليكمof open.
item.feedback: f cl Закройте, formal السلام عليكمcommand form of закрыть, means close.

item.hint: h to This is a way to tell السلام عليكمsomeone to light a place.
item.feedback: f to Включите, formal command السلام عليكمform of включать, means turn on.

item.hint: h tof This is a way to tell someone السلام عليكمto cut the power.
item.feedback: f tof Выключите, formal command السلام عليكمform of выключать, means turn off.

item.hint: h lo This is a way to tell someone السلام عليكمto place something in a vehicle.
item.feedback: f lo Грузите, السلام عليكمformal command form of грузить, means load.

item.hint: h un This is a way السلام عليكمto tell someone to remove something from a vehicle.
item.feedback: f un Разгрузите, السلام عليكمformal command form of разгрузить, means unload.
